FARMER001.title: Welcome to EchoHarvest! 🌾
FARMER001.message: You're now part of the farmer alert network. You'll receive alerts about crop diseases and pests in your area.

FARMER002.title: ⚠️ HIGH Risk: Brown Spot
FARMER002.message: ⚠️ HIGH RISK ALERT: Brown Spot has been detected in wheat crops approximately 1.5 km from your farm. A nearby farmer with similar conditions has reported this issue. Please inspect your crops and take preventive measures.

recommendations: Apply potassium fertilizer to strengthen plants
Use fungicides like Mancozeb or Carbendazim
